urbania_eiendom.name: Urbania Eiendom AS
urbania_eiendom.description: Property owner and main developer. Owns Hovfaret 13 through property SPV Hovfaret 13 AS.

hovfaret_13_as.name: Hovfaret 13 AS
hovfaret_13_as.description: Single Purpose Vehicle (SPV) that owns the property

natural_state.name: Natural State AS
natural_state.description: Sustainability and strategy consultancy leading project coordination, digital strategy, and bærekraft documentation.

r21_arkitekter.name: R21 Arkitekter
r21_arkitekter.description: Architecture firm responsible for transformation designs, plantegninger, and visualizations for all scenarios.

vill_energi.name: Vill Energi
vill_energi.description: Energy consultancy firm responsible for energy mapping, climate calculations, and sustainability reporting.

byggekonsulent.name: Byggekonsulent / Bykon
byggekonsulent.description: Building consultant providing technical advice on construction and structural matters.

oslo_kommune.name: Oslo Kommune
oslo_kommune.description: Municipality of Oslo - regulatory authority for building permits and area planning.

bydel_ullern.name: Bydel Ullern
bydel_ullern.description: Local district administration. Key stakeholder for Omsorg+ concept due to their housing needs for elderly.
bydel_ullern.interest: Omsorg+ housing - need for 70+ elderly housing units in coming years

skoyen_omradeforum.name: Skøyen Områdeforum
skoyen_omradeforum.description: Local area forum for Skøyen stakeholders coordinating area development interests.
skoyen_omradeforum.key_context: Submitted joint input to Oslo KPS (October 2024)

fram_eiendom.name: Fram Eiendom (Group)
fram_eiendom.description: Real estate group owning neighboring properties including Hovfaret 10, 17. Part of coordinated area development.
fram_eiendom.key_context: Hovfaret 10 also fundamented for 12 floors but limited to 7 by regulations

statsforvalteren.name: Statsforvalteren i Oslo og Viken
statsforvalteren.description: State representative handling appeals and objections to area plans.
statsforvalteren.role_in_project: Regulatory oversight - handling objections from Bane NOR and Statens vegvesen
statsforvalteren.key_context: Plan not legally binding due to pending objections

byggesaksradgivning.name: Byggesaksrådgivning AS
byggesaksradgivning.description: Building permit consultancy with 25+ years experience in Oslo. Specializes in building permits, user change applications, and sectioning cases. Previously handled the Covid-center conversion at Hovfaret 13.
byggesaksradgivning.role_in_project: Responsible Applicant (Ansvarlig søker) - handles bruksendringssøknad to Omsorg+ and regulatory process with PBE
byggesaksradgivning.key_context: Has previous experience with Hovfaret 13 - handled conversion to Skøyen Covid-senter and back. Key expertise in navigating PBE processes.

parabol.name: Parabol
parabol.description: Digital agency responsible for building and hosting the Hovfaret13.no website.
parabol.role_in_project: Website development and hosting for hovfaret13.no

nordic_circle_hotspot.name: Nordic Circle Hotspot / NCC
nordic_circle_hotspot.description: Network for circular economy in construction. Hovfaret 13 serves as a pilot project for testing circular building principles and materials.
nordic_circle_hotspot.role_in_project: Strategic partner - Hovfaret 13 is pilot customer for circular economy testing
nordic_circle_hotspot.key_context: Part of Nordic Circle Construction initiative. Project will test sirkulære byggematerialer and become living laboratory for circular principles.

Core Project Team.description: Organizations directly involved in project execution

Community / Neighbors.description: Local stakeholders and neighboring property owners
